item.title: 美国政府长期关门可能引发市场风险
item.description: 投资者数周前就已预计到美国政府关门会给市场带来风险。既然它已经到来，他们希望它只是短暂的。【原文：Investors have anticipated for weeks the risks of a U.S. government shutdown to markets. Now that it is here, they are hoping it will be brief.】

item.title: 聚焦：特朗普监管机构修改规则，美国银行有望在资本要求方面取得胜利
item.description: 据业内资深高管透露，随着唐纳德-特朗普总统的监管机构改革银行规则，大型贷款机构预计其资本要求可能会下降，这对于在前总统乔-拜登领导下面临大幅提高资本要求的银行业来说是一个惊人的胜利。【原文：As President Donald Trump's regulators revamp bank rules, big lenders expect their capital requirements could fall, in a stunning victory for the industry which faced a big hike under former President Joe Biden, according to senior industry executives.】

item.title: 特朗普政府在中期选举前瞄准数十个行业的交易
item.description: 据两位消息人士称，礼来公司被要求生产更多的胰岛素；辉瑞公司被要求生产更多的畅销抗癌药 Ibrance 和胆固醇药物立普妥；总部位于伦敦的阿斯利康公司被要求考虑在美国设立新的总部。【原文：Eli Lilly was asked to produce more insulin; Pfizer to produce more of its top-selling cancer drug Ibrance and its cholesterol drug Lipitor; and London-based AstraZeneca to consider a new headquarters in the U.S., according to two sources.】

item.title: FICO 推出直接抵押贷款评分许可，信用局股价下跌
item.description: 美国数据分析公司费尔-艾萨克公司（Fair Isaac Corp）公布了一项计划，允许抵押贷款转售商计算并直接向消费者分发其信用度评分，此后主要信用报告公司的股价周四下跌。【原文：Shares of major credit reporting companies tumbled on Thursday after U.S. data analytics company Fair Isaac Corp unveiled a program that allows mortgage resellers to calculate and distribute its creditworthiness score directly to consumers.】

item.title: 滑索、DJ 和特朗普：新加坡的加密货币会议让与会者欢呼雀跃
item.description: 从预测稳定币市场规模将达到数万亿美元，到赞扬美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对加密货币行业的支持，本周在新加坡举行的一场备受瞩目的会议为加密货币行业增添了一丝活力。【原文：From making predictions about a multi-trillion stablecoin market to praising U.S. President Donald Trump for his support of the crypto industry, a high-profile conference in Singapore this week added to the buoyant mood in the industry.】

item.title: 降息乐观情绪再起，标普 500 指数和纳斯达克指数期货攀升
item.description: 周四早盘，在弱于预期的民间就业数据增强了降息希望之后，与 S&P 500 指数和纳斯达克指数挂钩的期货上涨，而交易员们则为美国政府关门导致的数据清淡时段做好了准备。【原文：Futures tied to the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq indexes rose early on Thursday, a day after weaker-than-expected private payrolls data bolstered hopes for interest rate cuts, while traders braced for a data-light session due to the U.S. government shutdown.】

item.title: 欧盟风险监督机构呼吁对稳定币采取紧急保障措施
item.description: 欧盟金融风险监督机构周四呼吁对仅在该集团内部分发行的稳定币采取紧急保障措施，这与欧洲中央银行的警告不谋而合，欧洲中央银行担心稳定币的失效可能会引发储备挤兑。【原文：The European Union's financial risk watchdog called on Thursday for urgent safeguards on stablecoins only partly issued in the bloc, echoing a warning from the European Central Bank, which is worried that their failure could induce a run on reserves.】

item.title: 欧洲央行选择人工智能初创公司防止数字欧元欺诈行为
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）周四表示，它已选定一家专注于人工智能的葡萄牙初创公司，帮助其防止计划中的欧元数字货币出现欺诈行为。【原文：The European Central Bank said on Thursday it had picked a Portuguese startup focussed on artificial intelligence to help prevent frauds in its planned digital euro currency.】

item.title: 公司估值 4.15 亿美元
item.description: 这是一条突发新闻。全面报道将很快发布。【原文：This is a breaking news story. Full coverage will be available soon.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，德国 DeepL 正考虑在美国上市
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道，总部位于德国的人工智能翻译开发商 DeepL 正在考虑在美国进行首次公开募股。【原文：DeepL, a Germany-based developer of artificial intelligence-based translation, is considering an initial public offering in the United States, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Shein 计划在法国开设首家永久门店，引发反弹
item.description: 根据与百货公司所有者 Société des Grands Magasins 签订的协议，在线快速时尚零售商 Shein 将于 11 月在法国开设首家长期门店，此举引发了法国零售商的批评。【原文：Online fast-fashion retailer Shein will open its first permanent stores in France in November under an agreement with department store owner Société des Grands Magasins, a move that sparked criticism from French retailers.】

item.title: 斯泰兰特、沃尔沃汽车股价上涨，原因是美国销量不惧关税担忧
item.description: 欧洲汽车制造商沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Cars）和斯特兰蒂斯公司（Stellantis）的股票周四跳涨，因为美国销售数据强于预期，帮助缓解了人们对关税可能削弱需求的担忧。【原文：Shares in European automakers Volvo Cars and Stellantis jumped on Thursday after stronger than expected U.S. sales figures helped ease concerns that tariffs might dent demand.】

item.title: 私募市场迎接周期性考验，亚洲市场退出依然紧张
item.description: 在新加坡举行的一次会议上，两位高级投资管理人员表示，由于亚洲公开市场上未经考验的信贷周期与脆弱的退出途径相冲突，私人信贷和私募股权投资的蓬勃发展正准备接受现实的检验。【原文：The boom in private credit and private equity is poised for a reality check as an untested credit cycle collides with fragile exit routes in Asia's public markets, two senior investment executives said at a conference in Singapore.】

item.title: 台湾考虑与美国建立高科技战略伙伴关系
item.description: 台湾最高关税谈判代表周四表示，台湾正在考虑与美国建立高科技战略伙伴关系，美国希望增加台湾的投资，并介绍了与华盛顿会谈的最新情况。【原文：Taiwan is considering forming a high-tech strategic partnership with the U.S., which wants increased Taiwanese investment, the island's top tariff negotiator said on Thursday, giving an update on talks with Washington.】

item.title: 花旗集团上调以太坊前景，下调比特币前景，原因是投资者流向发生变化
item.description: 花旗集团将以太币的年终目标价从 4300 美元上调至 4500 美元，理由是来自 ETF 和数字资产国债的资金流强劲。【原文：Citigroup raised its year-end price target for ether to $4,500 from $4,300, citing strong flows from ETFs and digital asset treasuries.】

item.title: 消息人士称，股票出售后，OpenAI 的估值达到 5000 亿美元
item.description: 一位熟知内情的消息人士周四告诉路透社，ChatGPT 背后的公司 OpenAI 在现任和前任员工出售了价值约 66 亿美元的股票后，估值已达 5000 亿美元。【原文：OpenAI, the company behind ChatGPT, has reached a valuation of $500 billion following a deal in which current and former employees sold roughly $6.6 billion worth of shares, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴地图创下中国假期首日日活用户纪录
item.description: 阿里巴巴公司在一份声明中说，阿里巴巴的地图应用淘地图在周三中国国庆八天长假的第一天录得超过 3.6 亿的日活跃用户，创下了该平台的历史新高。【原文：Alibaba's mapping app Amap recorded more than 360 million daily active users on the first day of China's eight-day National Day holiday on Wednesday, setting an all-time high for the platform, the company said in a statement.】

item.title: 美国就业市场低迷，欧洲暗夜下跌
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，环球音乐和华纳音乐即将达成人工智能许可协议
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周四援引知情人士的话报道称，环球音乐公司和华纳音乐公司即将达成具有里程碑意义的人工智能许可协议。【原文：Universal Music and Warner Music are nearing landmark artificial intelligence licensing deals, the Financial Times reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 谷歌称黑客向高管发送勒索邮件
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司表示，黑客正在向数量不详的高管发送勒索邮件，声称从他们的甲骨文业务应用程序中窃取了敏感数据。【原文：Alphabet's Google said hackers are sending extortion emails to an unspecified number of executives, claiming to have stolen sensitive data from their Oracle business applications.】

item.title: 美国能源部取消 76 亿美元项目资金
item.description: 美国能源部周三表示，计划取消为数百个能源项目提供的 75.6 亿美元融资，称这些项目无法为纳税人带来足够的回报。【原文：The U.S. Department of Energy on Wednesday said it planned to cancel $7.56 billion in financing for hundreds of energy projects that it said would not provide sufficient returns to taxpayers.】

item.title: 科技股引领亚洲股市反弹，黄金因美联储降息押注接近纪录高位
item.description: 周四，科技股大涨，推动亚洲股指走高，而黄金则徘徊在纪录高点附近，美元则因美国劳动力市场报告疲软支撑了对美联储降息的押注而萎靡不振。【原文：Tech shares rallied on Thursday, driving Asia stock indexes higher, while gold hovered near a record high and the dollar languished as a weak U.S. labour market report bolstered bets for Federal Reserve interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 黄金出口锐减，澳大利亚贸易顺差大幅缩水
item.description: 周四的数据显示，澳大利亚 8 月份的货物贸易顺差大幅缩减，原因是黄金出货量在连续几个月的强劲增长后大幅下滑，而进口量则全面增长。【原文：Australia's surplus on goods trade shrank sharply in August as shipments of gold plunged after a run of strong months, data showed on Thursday, while imports were up across the board.】

item.title: 俄罗斯原油制裁有望收紧，原油从 16 周低点反弹
item.description: 油价周四上涨，结束了连续三日的跌势，并从16周低点反弹，原因是俄罗斯原油有望受到更严格的制裁，但对欧佩克+下月增产导致供应增加的预期抑制了涨幅。【原文：Oil prices rose on Thursday, snapping a three-day losing streak and rebounding from 16-week lows on prospects of tighter sanctions on Russian crude, though expectations of higher supply from an OPEC+ output boost next month capped gains.】

item.title: 最高法院允许美联储主席库克暂时留任，美元上涨
item.description: 美国最高法院表示将在1月份就唐纳德-特朗普总统试图罢免美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）一案举行听证会，暂时让她留任，此后美元在周四亚洲早盘重新站稳了脚跟。【原文：The U.S. dollar regained its footing in early Asian trading on Thursday after the U.S. Supreme Court said it would hear arguments in January over President Donald Trump's attempt to remove Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook, leaving her in the post for now.】

item.title: 阿根廷米莱伊称美国援助谈判包括债务购买和利润分享
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱说，美国对阿根廷的金融支持建议可能包括在二级市场购买该国的债务和利润分享安排。【原文：Argentina's President Javier Milei said proposed U.S. financial support for Argentina could include purchases of the country's debt in the secondary market and a profit-sharing arrangement.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：中国限制在电信网络中使用诺基亚和爱立信
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周三援引熟悉内情的人士的话报道称，中国正在限制在其网络中使用欧洲电信设备供应商诺基亚和爱立信的产品。【原文：China is curbing the use of European telecom kit suppliers Nokia and Ericsson in its networks, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 三星、SK 海力士股价因 OpenAI 合作关系而上涨
item.description: 三星电子和 SK 海力士签署了为 OpenAI 数据中心供应存储芯片的意向书后，这两家韩国芯片制造商的股票周四大涨。【原文：Shares of Samsung Electronics and SK Hynix rallied on Thursday after the South Korean chipmakers signed letters of intent to supply memory chips for OpenAI's data centers.】

item.title: 墨西哥汽车业警告称，USMCA 审查前前景复杂
item.description: 墨西哥汽车业警告说，在 2026 年《美国-墨西哥-加拿大协定》（USMCA）审查之前将面临 "复杂的前景"，汽车业高管们对更严格的原产地规则和对零部件中亚洲成分的审查表示担忧。【原文：Mexico's auto industry warned of a "complex outlook" ahead of the 2026 review of the United States-Mexico-Canada Agreement (USMCA), with executives citing concerns over tighter rules of origin and scrutiny of Asian content in components.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称中国和马来西亚正在洽谈稀土提炼项目
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，中国和马来西亚正在就稀土加工项目进行早期谈判，主权财富基金马来西亚国家矿业公司（Khazanah Nasional）可能与一家中国国有企业合作，在这个东南亚国家建设一座精炼厂。【原文：China and Malaysia are in early talks for a project to process rare earths, with sovereign wealth fund Khazanah Nasional likely to partner with a Chinese state-owned firm to build a refinery in the Southeast Asian nation, people familiar with the matter said.】
